EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: See you on November 11 for Pivotal and the Connected Car Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal and the Connected Car event on Tuesday, November 11! Please review the details below and contact us with any questions.
Pivotal and the Connected Car Tuesday, November 11, 2014 4:30pm - 7:00pm Presentation followed by cocktails and appetizers
LOCATION Detroit Athletic Club <http://www.thedac.com/siteContent.aspx?pageId=VSLjF8vgVU2eWUJv_fSHsA&menuId=Cn-v4L0soEGWXClzRwKnaw> 241 Madison Avenue Detroit, MI 48226
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
